name: HBCU - opoly
description:
HBCU-opoly board game is the perfect property trading board game for Historically Black College alumni, students and future grads. Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs) now have their own version of a board game which spotlights the happenings, history, and facts on some of the best college campuses in the HBCU system. Buy and sell HBCU schools, events, and other board spaces as you try to end the game with the most money.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
